personalInfo.name: Balasubramanian Nagarajan
personalInfo.title: Senior Software Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Highly experienced Software Engineer with 8.7 years of expertise in front-end development, specializing in React, TypeScript, JavaScript, Redux, and React-Query, complemented by proficiency in Java for backend contributions. Proven leader in spearheading complex enterprise and fintech solutions, driving revenue growth, optimizing workflows, and significantly enhancing user experience across diverse platforms. Skilled in fostering cross-functional collaboration, proactively resolving critical issues, and dedicated to mentoring junior developers for continuous improvement.

accomplishments.title: Revenue Generation
accomplishments.description: Generated $6M+ in revenue by developing Fresh-survey platform, reducing third-party tool reliance

accomplishments.title: Bug Resolution Excellence
accomplishments.description: Resolved 200+ critical bugs, significantly enhancing system stability and user satisfaction

accomplishments.title: Multi-Market Deployment
accomplishments.description: Successfully deployed License & Permits Manager features to 14 markets under tight deadlines

accomplishments.title: PWA Innovation
accomplishments.description: Initiated and developed PWA concepts, enhancing user experience and expanding mobile reach

accomplishments.title: Team Leadership
accomplishments.description: Led vendor teams, elevating app standards, improving performance, code quality, and user satisfaction

accomplishments.title: Mentorship Impact
accomplishments.description: Actively mentored junior developers, fostering continuous improvement and best practices

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A responsive portfolio website showcasing my work and skills with smooth animations and modern design.

projects.name: Mock Trello
projects.description: A comprehensive task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time updates, and collaborative features.

projects.name: Pictionary Game
projects.description: An interactive multiplayer pictionary game with real-time drawing, chat functionality, and room management.

certifications.name: MERN Stack Certification
certifications.description: Comprehensive certification covering MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js development

awards.title: Bravo Award
awards.description: Recognition for outstanding performance and contributions during first tenure at Walmart

awards.title: ACMICPC 18th Rank
awards.description: Achieved 18th rank in team coding competition demonstrating strong algorithmic and problem-solving skills

awards.title: Microsoft Student Associate
awards.description: Selected as Microsoft Student Associate, promoting Microsoft technologies and organizing tech events

achievements: Spearheading front-end development for Finance Resolve Hub (FRH), a new fintech product aimed at streamlining seller dispute resolution, reducing processing times, and driving revenue through efficiency.
Driving core front-end implementation (70%) using React, Redux, TypeScript, JavaScript, and React-Query to build intuitive user interfaces.
Contributing to backend development (20%) leveraging Java to support application functionality.
Collaborating on architectural decisions, design discussions, and code reviews with Staff Engineers and product teams, also mentoring junior developers.

Spearheaded front-end development of the Fresh-survey platform (a micro-frontend) integrated across Fresh-desk, Fresh-chat, and Fresh-service, generating $6M+ in revenue by reducing third-party tool reliance.
Collaborated with UX designers and product managers to define requirements and ensure a seamless user experience.
Resolved 200+ critical bugs, enhancing stability and user satisfaction across multiple products.
Proposed and implemented strategic product enhancements to align with roadmap goals and boost customer engagement.
Facilitated a collaborative team culture through technical problem-solving guidance and best practice sharing.
Led front-end development of the License & Permits Manager, deploying features to 14 markets under tight deadlines.
Developed a PWA concept to enhance mobile usability and cross-platform development efficiency.
Built user-friendly interfaces for license procurement/renewal using React, JS, TS, Material-UI, and Redux.
Ensured high code quality through code reviews and design collaboration.
Mentored junior developers, fostering continuous improvement.
Led vendor team, elevating app standards, improving performance, code quality, and user satisfaction.
Presented regular POCs (Proofs of Concept) for continuous feature improvements.
Successfully delivered applications, exceeding project goals within tight timelines.
Initiated PWA concept, enhancing user experience and expanding mobile reach.
Led the development of an Android scanner application for warehouse optimization, effectively streamlining workflows for a major retail client.
Modernized legacy Oracle forms using React, Spring Boot, and Oracle SQL, significantly enhancing interface usability and performance.
Consistently met and exceeded client expectations in project delivery by adhering to tight deadlines.
Graduated with a 7.87 GPA.
Elected Treasurer of the Computer Science and Engineering Department (2015).
Participated in the Microsoft Student Training Club and served as a Microsoft Student Associate (MSA) for 2013-2014.
Member of the Logical & Aptitude Training Club.
Designed certificates, ID cards, and banners for the CS & IT Department.
